archimate:Principle.name: Cryptographic Trust
archimate:Principle.documentation: Trust bestowed in a set of machines (Man-Made Things) that are operating a set of cryptographic algorithms will behave as expected. This form of trust is based in mathematics and computer hardware/software engineering. Compare with Human Trust. See Appendix D.
